mapper.select: select EMP_ID, MANAGER_ID , CLI_CD , ANIMAL_CD , EMP_JOB , EMP_NAME, EMP_TEL , EMP_ZIPCODE , EMP_ADD1 , EMP_ADD2 , to_char(EMP_JOIN_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS EMP_JOIN_DATE, EMP_RETIRE_DATE, EMP_STATE , EMP_BIRTH , EMP_PW , EMP_CURRENT , EMP_MAIL , EMP_PROFILE from employees where cli_cd = 'h001' and emp_state = '재직중'

select nvl2(nullif(emp_state, '퇴사'), emp_id, REGEXP_REPLACE(EMP_ID, '[^.$]', '*')) AS EMP_ID, MANAGER_ID , CLI_CD , ANIMAL_CD , nvl2(nullif(emp_state, '퇴사'), EMP_JOB, REGEXP_REPLACE(EMP_JOB, '[^.$]', '*')) AS EMP_JOB , EMP_NAME, nvl2(nullif(emp_state, '퇴사'), EMP_TEL, REGEXP_REPLACE(EMP_TEL, '[^.$]', '*')) AS EMP_TEL , nvl2(nullif(emp_state, '퇴사'), EMP_ZIPCODE, REGEXP_REPLACE(EMP_ZIPCODE, '[^.$]', '*')) AS EMP_ZIPCODE , nvl2(nullif(emp_state, '퇴사'), EMP_ADD1, REGEXP_REPLACE(EMP_ADD1, '[^.$]', '*')) AS EMP_ADD1 , nvl2(nullif(emp_state, '퇴사'), EMP_ADD2, REGEXP_REPLACE(EMP_ADD2, '[^.$]', '*')) AS EMP_ADD2 , nvl2(nullif(emp_state, '퇴사'), to_char(EMP_JOIN_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), REGEXP_REPLACE(to_char(EMP_JOIN_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), '[^.$]', '*')) AS EMP_JOIN_DATE, EMP_RETIRE_DATE, EMP_STATE , EMP_BIRTH , EMP_PW , EMP_CURRENT , EMP_MAIL , EMP_PROFILE from employees where cli_cd = 'h001' order by emp_state
mapper.insert:
SELECT employees_seq.nextval from dual
insert into employees( EMP_ID, MANAGER_ID, CLI_CD, ANIMAL_CD, EMP_JOB, EMP_NAME, EMP_PROFILE, EMP_TEL, EMP_ZIPCODE, EMP_ADD1, EMP_ADD2, EMP_JOIN_DATE, EMP_STATE, EMP_BIRTH, EMP_PW, EMP_MAIL, EMP_CURRENT ) values( #{cliCd}||'-e00'||#{empId}, #{managerId}, #{cliCd}, #{animalCd}, #{empJob}, #{empName}, #{empProfile}, #{empTel}, #{empZipcode}, #{empAdd1}, #{empAdd2}, #{empJoinDate}, '재직중', #{empBirth}, #{empPw}, #{empMail}, 'O' )

update employees set ANIMAL_CD=#{animalCd}, EMP_JOB=#{empJob}, EMP_NAME=#{empName}, EMP_PROFILE=#{empProfile}, EMP_TEL=TO_NUMBER(#{empTel}), EMP_ZIPCODE=#{empZipcode}, EMP_ADD1=#{empAdd1}, EMP_ADD2=#{empAdd2}, EMP_JOIN_DATE=#{empJoinDate}, EMP_BIRTH=#{empBirth}, EMP_PW=#{empPw}, EMP_MAIL=#{empMail} where EMP_ID=#{empId}
mapper.select: select a.EMP_ID, a.EMP_PW, a.MANAGER_ID, a.CLI_CD, a.ANIMAL_CD, a.EMP_JOB, a.EMP_NAME, a.EMP_PROFILE, a.EMP_TEL, a.EMP_ZIPCODE, a.EMP_ADD1, a.EMP_ADD2, a.EMP_MAIL, to_char(EMP_JOIN_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as EMP_JOIN_DATE, to_char(a.EMP_RETIRE_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as EMP_RETIRE_DATE, a.EMP_STATE, to_char(EMP_BIRTH, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as EMP_BIRTH, b.emp_auth_name from employees a, emp_auth b where a.EMP_ID = b.EMP_ID and a.EMP_ID = #{empId}
SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NAME FROM EMPLOYEES WHERE ANIMAL_CD = #{animalCd} and emp_state = '재직중'
SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_PROFILE FROM EMPLOYEES WHERE EMP_NAME LIKE '%'||#{empName}||'%'
SELECT EMP_ID FROM EMPLOYEES WHERE EMP_NAME = #{empName} AND EMP_TEL = #{empTel}
SELECT EMP_PW FROM EMPLOYEES WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId} AND EMP_MAIL = #{empMail}
mapper.update: UPDATE EMPLOYEES SET EMP_RETIRE_DATE = to_date(#{empRetireDate}, 'yyyy/MM/dd') WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId}
